Long live Queen Meera!Folks, please pay close attention to Johnny Depp’s  harassing and abusive $50 million dollar lawsuit against Ms. Heard for an op ed she wrote speaking out about how Hollywood is complicit in covering for rapists and abusers among them.   She didn’t say anything untrue.   Not only is the lawsuit without merit, but more importantly, it has a silencing effect on all domestic abuse victims.   Johnny Depp should be ashamed of himself.   Unfortunately, the case was assigned to a judge known for misogynistic decisions against women, including women trying to escape domestic violence.   I don’t think that was an accident.
